attributes.action: Please listen to the voice of the voters who would now like to "Remain".
attributes.background:
According to a recent poll, over 1,100,000 people who voted "Leave" in the EU referendum say they regret their decision.

As it emerges the promises made by the "Leave" campaigners cannot be kept, we the undersigned would like it heard that we wish to change our vote.

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a second referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
